Virgin Money Giving API Software Development Kit v1.00

This Javadoc describes how to use the Virgin Money Giving Java SDK to access the Virgin Money Giving API.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1 Top-level classes which provide direct access to the Virgin Money Giving (VMG) /v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.charity.request Bean classes which represent the business objects sent to the VMG /charities/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.charity.response Bean classes which represent the business objects returned from the VMG /charities/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.event.request Bean classes which represent the business objects sent to the VMG /events/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.event.response Bean classes which represent the business objects returned from the VMG /events/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.request Bean classes which represent the business objects sent to the VMG /fundraisers/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.fundraiser.response Bean classes which represent the business objects returned from the VMG /fundraisers/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.exceptions Exception classes.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.messaging Classes which represent the messages and content sent to and received from the /v1 API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.messaging.charity.response Classes which represent the messages and content received from the VMG /charities/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.messaging.event.response Classes which represent the messages and content received from the VMG /events/v1/ API.
com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.messaging.fundraiser.response Classes which represent the messages and content received from the VMG /fundraisers/v1/ API.

 

This Javadoc describes how to use the Virgin Money Giving Java SDK to access the Virgin Money Giving API.

It is deliberately lightweight and does not detail how the API itself should be used; for this please refer to the online documentation at http://developer.virginmoneygiving.com.

Before you start, you will need an API Key, which can be obtained from the above link.

Making a call to the API via this SDK

  • Obtain an API key if you don't already have one
  • Create an instance of the API class you wish to use, i.e ConnectCharityAPI or ConnectEventAPI or ConnectFundraiserAPI
  • Call the method which corresponds to the API call you wish to make
  • Examine the results of the isOK() method in the result - if the result is not true then an error has occurred
  • Examine the results of the getErrors() method in the result - if the result is not empty then an error has occurred
  • Call the getResponseBean() method in the result - this will return you the contents of the API result

If you are using the SDK through a proxy server, you will need to pass in the proxy configuration details via the {@link com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.ApiConsumerDetails) class. Refer to the samples included in the SDK for an example of how to do this.
